ygData.subject: Sol Ro Temple Bardic Weapon Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I ran by the temple yesterday because I couldn t quite remember the details of the special bardic weapon comment.  You see, I was fairly certain that the quest
ygData.messageBody:
I ran by the temple yesterday because I couldn't quite remember the details
of the special bardic weapon comment. You see, I was fairly certain that
the quest giver used to say, Remember to ask me later about "a special
bardic weapon." However, now he says, Remember to ask me later about "a
SPECIFIC bardic weapon." I think the fact that he says specific is
certainly a strong indicator that this quest starts elsewhere in the world.
We're going to have to follow clues to get the name of this weapon, at which
point we ask him about it and he gives us the quest to get it. Sounds great
to me! Anyone up for a search? Anyone think I'm loony and the quest just
isn't in the game yet?

Laena -- Bard, 29 E'ci
